sourcesContent: import t,{useContext as o,useMemo as a}from"react";import r from"../utils/with-defaults";import i from"../utils/clsx";import{StyledModalHeader as n}from"./modal.styles";import{ModalContext as s}from"./modal-context";import{jsx as e}from"react/jsx-runtime";const m="nextui-modal-header",d=({children:t,className:r,justify:d,autoMargin:u,css:c,...l})=>{const{autoMargin:f,noPadding:g}=o(s),p=a((()=>void 0!==f?f:u),[u,f]);return e(n,{autoMargin:p,className:i(m,{[`${m}-auto-margin`]:p,[`${m}-no-padding`]:g},r),css:{justifyContent:d,...c},noPadding:g,...l,children:t})};d.toString=()=>".nextui-modal-header";const u=t.memo(d);export default r(u,{className:"",justify:"center",autoMargin:!0});
